name: Deep Sea Diver (Gimbalock)
description:
Description:

The game is simple! Dive as deep as you can, without hitting to many jellyfish, and without running out of oxygen.

This game is made for the Ludum Dare 48 Game Jam, in less than 48 hours.

The theme for Ludum Dare 48 was "Deeper and deeper".

Controls:

You use the arrow keys to control the diver. Try to avoid the jellyfish and collect oxygen bubbles to stay alive.

Programs used:

All programs used are free to use!

  • Stencyl
  • Pixlr.com
  • Pixilart.com
  • Audacity
